titleStmt.title: Average reactions black students get daily

div.p: How dare you blackstudents of the University complain?
I think it's perfectly asinine ofyou people to think you can get something for nothing. Furthermore, I think you've been given enough already.
After all, there isn't a white student union on campus -- neither would it have been permitted.

Look at all the money SGA appro
priated you just because you're black. Let's face it. You niggers get all the breaks. When there's an opening in the dining halls or the janitorial staff, who gets the job? A nigger.

Look at the riots. You niggers damned near robbed my brother-in
law blind. Now he can't even get the insurance company to pay off. Violence isn't the answer especially when it' communist inspired.

What if we whites had armed our
selves and looted black businesses? You claim that the black student population isn't representative of black population on a whole.
Can we help it if niggers don't want to come here? Besides, nobody had to tell me to come here.
Furthermore, you have to accept the fact that the black students aren't as intelligent as whites and therefore won't do as well in college.
You think you have it bad. Look at the Jews, the Irish, the Italians. They made it, didn't they? Why can't you people stop making bad scenes?

Don't your leaders have any con
trol over you savages? The display of violence in the SGA budget hearing was simply disgraceful. You say you don't want tokenism but you were willing to accept only two black mem
bers on the cheer leading squad.
Why not the whole squad? You also showed extreme lack of respect for our great President Elkins. Hasn't he established an effective enough line of communication between you and his administration?
If not, why don't you tell him so? There's a proper way to get results at the University.

I close my comments by saying you
should take a good look at yourselves and realize that good hard work and a good education is all you need to get ahead.
This is a letter which is full of the racism that confronts black students everyday.

The person who wrote this letter is considered armed, dangerous and an enemy to America in any age group, in any establish
ment, in any city or even crawling out of the woodwork.
Whitey, it is your duty to seek him out and destroy him, before we do!
